name: Downside Up
description:
Downside Up

An entry for Ludum Dare 37.

The theme was 'One Room' and the game takes place in a single room. But! You can run on the walls yo! You didn't expect that did you? And when you kill all the monsters on a wall you can generate a new maze on the opposite side. More monsters, different mazes. It never ends! Fancy that.

If you like the game, go rate us on Ludum Dare.

The team was:

Joe Bain - @oh_cripes - Programming

Ryan Timpany - @cYnborg - Modelling / Animation

George Cheal - @bonsaitreehouse - Modelling / 2D Art

Dicky Moore - @dickymoo - SFX & Music
